privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_desc: This website is my personal portfolio. I do not automatically collect personal visitor data unless you voluntarily fill out the contact form. Data submitted through the contact form is only used for professional communication purposes.
privacy.section2_desc: I will not sell, rent, or share your personal information with any third parties. Your data is secure and will only be used as a means for me to respond to your messages.
privacy.section3_desc: We use a simple internal analytics system to monitor website traffic to improve user experience. This system does not record data that can directly identify your personal identity.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.copyright: Copyright Â© 2026 Rizky Haffiyan Roseno. All rights reserved.
terms.section1_desc: This website is provided solely for the purpose of demonstrating a professional portfolio and for education. All content, projects, and designs displayed represent my technical expertise as a software engineer.
terms.section2_desc: All source code, designs, and content on this website are protected by copyright. You are allowed to view the code for evaluation purposes, but are not permitted to copy, modify, distribute, or use this project commercially without my explicit written permission.
terms.section3_desc: I provide no warranties of any kind regarding the continuous availability, accuracy, or completeness of the information on this website. The use of information or systems herein is entirely at the user's own risk.
